SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.am16
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.util

Class GUIState

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am16.client.view.gui.util.GUIState
public class GUIState extends Object
Bean-like class that stores important information about the state of a GUI. This class is thread safe.

    • setTurnOrder

      public void setTurnOrder(List<String> turnOrder)
      Sets the order in which players will play in this game.
      Parameters:
      turnOrder - The order in which players will play in this game. Must contain only usernames in the list returned by getPlayerUsernames().

    • getTurnOrder

      public List<String> getTurnOrder()
      Returns:
      A list of the current players in this game, ordered in the order in which they will play during the game.
